title: Megane de H de Konamaiki!
description:
Somehow Shitsui is attracted to the silent and mysterious Sorayume. But she won't talk to him or even seem to acknowledge his presence. He hears bad rumors about sicence club disasters and calling UFO's from the shool roof. Then one day he demands to know why she won't talk to anyone. She startles Shitsui by asking his birthdate and blood-type. When he tells her she grabs his hand and drags him to a hidden spot on the schoolgrounds and then...

Their adventures continue with jealous club president Okamoto--and Shitsui and Sorayume finally go out on a date!
